method: **Ritual Progression:** Ironmen ***must*** prioritize upgrading the Well of Souls and getting lesser/greater materials.
tips: Farm Imps or Chickens for early bones. Hermod is critical at level 60 for armor plates.

method: **Hermod farming:** You will need ~30 Hermod Plates for full T70-T90 power/tank gear. Do this now for XP and supplies.
tips: Bank all the Lesser/Greater ensouled bars, you will need thousands for T90/95 upgrades.

method: **Slayer / Fetid Zombies:** Train Slayer alongside Necromancy. Use T70 Weapon/Armor.
tips: Fetid Zombies drop ashes needed for Ink making. Do not skip them.

method: **Rasial, The First Necromancer:** Start learning Rasial at 90+ for T95 drops.
tips: T95 gear is a massive DPS increase. Camp Rasial until log completion.

method: **Rituals (Ink Farming):** You will likely need to do rituals for ink upkeep anyway.
tips: Maintain a surplus of Ectoplasm from rituals.
